_header: Though this book be evil to read

YaleBei331.Transcription:
Those this boke be evile to redeAs in englishe not veray
                    ornateyet to hevyn it wil the ledeThy mynd ther to therfor
                    associateAnd inwardly be not desolateThe entent ther of do thou
                    takeAnd pray for hym that dyd yt make
YaleBei331.Note:
Added by a hand of the sixteenth century; immediately following
                    Rolle’s Fire of Love (pp. 1-134).
